meanings.def: used to say that a particular situation or fact makes you sad or disappointed, or gets you into a difficult position
examples: Unfortunately, I won't be able to attend the meeting.
unfortunately for somebody/something Unfortunately for him, the police had been informed and were waiting outside.
It won't be finished for a few weeks. Unfortunately!
We wanted to have only films from Spain at this year's festival. Unfortunately, however, there weren't enough good ones.
